column2: Move Capital to Algiers
Algiers now belongs to us. It is time to move our government back to its proper place!
Declare Independence

For too long, the home government has ignored the interests of $COUNTRY$. Many in our country clamour for independence, allowing us full control over our defence and trade affairs to chart our own course through history. The opportunity is ripe to advance a declaration of independence, but this move would be a drastic one that may tear our political landscape asunder. The conservative and reactionary factions of our society will undoubtedly view this move as a treasonous insurrection.
Now that we have gained independance from Britain, we can now assert our control over the outback.
Claiming the Interior
Now that we have gained independance from Britain, we can now assert our control over our islands.
Claiming the Interior
Since Banat and Transylvania joined the German state they have been cut off by the autonomous regions, perhaps we should re-integrate them?
Integrating the Autonomous Regions
Integrating the Autonomous Regions
Since Banat and Transylvania joined the German state they have been cut off by the autonomous regions, perhaps we should re-integrate them?
Declare Independence

For too long, the home government has ignored the interests of $COUNTRY$. Many in our country clamour for independence, allowing us full control over our defence and trade affairs to chart our own course through history. The opportunity is ripe to advance a declaration of independence, but this move would be a drastic one that may tear our political landscape asunder. The conservative and reactionary factions of our society will undoubtedly view this move as a treasonous insurrection.
Petition for Independence

The democratic voice within our country has spoken - our people wish to assert their right to self-determination. The will of the people compels us to petition the mother government for a peaceful separation.
The Balfour Declaration (1926)

The former colonies, now Dominions, are agitating for greater autonomy and recognition on the world stage. This declaration will proclaim the United Kingdom and the dominions to be equals in external affairs, united by their allegiance to a common Crown rather than by the supremacy and paramountcy of the United Kingdom and its Parliament. The dominions hope this will lead to their full legislative sovereignty in the future.
Adopt the Statute of Westminster

The Statute of Westminster enables us to amend or repeal Imperial legislation applying to our dominion, prevents Imperial law from automatically extending to our territory, and repeals the doctrine of repugnancy whereby Imperial laws prevail over conflicting dominion laws.  All future laws passed in the British Parliament will apply to us at our request and with our consent. However, we must officially ratify the Statute for it to apply to our country.
The British Empire Games

Melville Marks "Bobby" Robinson, a sports reporter from Hamilton, Ontario, helped to organise the first British Empire Games in 1930 -- a multi-sport competition in the style of the Olympics open to all members of the Empire. Teams from England, the colonies, and the various dominions and home countries came to Hamilton to compete in the first Games. Events included track and field, bowling, boxing, rowing, swimming and wrestling (women competed only in the swimming events). Following the success of the Hamilton Games a second Games was held in London four years later.

$COUNTRY_ADJ$ strength is now enough to challenge the Great Powers of Europe, and now they can do little to stop our right to trade with the African continent. They denied our right, but now we can overturn the laws that banished the slave trade, and allow our country to flourish like never before.
Reinstate the Atlantic Slave Trade

Cuban independence is in our best interests, as it allows us to control the heart of the Golden Circle: Havana. The people may not approve, but we must take control of Cuba for the glory of the Confederate States!
Annex Cuba

Not so long ago, the island of Haiti was a French slave state. The people there are wary of our might, but they cannot deny the Confederate influence that affects them in everything they do. They do not understand how joining us would be favourable to them, but they are blind. We will claim what is ours, and make the Haitians know their place.
Annex Haiti

Just as some of the Southern states were under the power of the Spanish crown, so too was Puerto Rico. We have convinced them that this draws our countries together, and now they wish to be a part of our nation.
Annex Puerto Rico

War is burning our nation, and soon the people will force us to surrender. We say nay! It may go against our core beliefs, but to win this conflict we must allow slaves to be freed, so long as they willingly enlist as soldiers. This may be a heavy price, but it is a price that we have to pay in these dark times.
Enlist Slaves as the Coloured Troops
Caribean Purchase
Cigars and Rum for everyone!.

The great goal of the Knights of the Golden Circle is nearly accomplished. By moving our capital to Havana, on the island of Cuba, we will once and for all assert our dominance over the Caribbean seas. For Dixie, and the Golden Circle!
Move the Capital to Havana

A symbol of American power and prestige, this building has no meaning to us. However, desecrating this symbol will make the American people less willing to go on, and it will certainly be a blow to the international prestige of the United States.
Burn the White House

The French still wish for a real foothold in the New World, and prior to the beginning of the 19th century, their foothold was Haiti. Now with this island under our control, should we relinquish it in order to better our relations with France, and allow them to regain some old glory?
Sell Haiti to France

Now that the Atlantic Slave Trade has been established once more, we have the opportuniy to join it and reap the infamous profits of an age-old institution. Though it will anger the Great Powers, perhaps it shall lead to an alliance between these Atlantic slave states?
Join the Atlantic Slave Trade
Though at once it seemed like a good and profitable idea, the Atlantic Slave Trade has only brought us ruin and infamy. It is time to end our participation in this damned trade.
Leave the Atlantic Slave Trade

The trading of slaves must stop. We once profited from the Atlantic Slave Trade, just as the nations of Europe did in their golden ages centuries ago, but the slave trade is not an institution for the modern age. We must bring an end to it once again, burying it in the pages of history.
Dismantle the Atlantic Slave Trade

Signed into law in 1862, the purpose of the Homestead Act was to further encourage peaceful immigration from other countries, primarily Europe, and in this it was a major success. This act grants those immigrant farmers who apply some 160 acres of federal land in areas not controlled by $COUNTRY_ADJ$ plantation owners.
Enact the Homestead Act

Rumours say that in Sioux territory there are rivers full of gold, untapped to this day. For the prosperity of our nation it is best to investigate this, and so we have at the ready a veteran Samuel Cooper to send into the Black Hills...
Expedition to the Black Hills

As times wears on, the institution of slavery continues to grow more and more unpopular. We will not stand for this! To improve our grip on slavery, we must spread word amongst the people that slavery is good, and will lead to a better nation. So long as there is $COUNTRY_ADJ$ doubt about slavery, this propaganda must go on.
Spread Pro-Slavery Propaganda

Some lucky slaves have earned their freedom, or were spared enslavement in the first place. Their freedom is at an end. We will seek them out and make them work, though it will lower our standing in the world and could spark rebellion amongst the people of $COUNTRY$.
Enslave the Now Free

We are still inferior to the Union, and rely on them for Pacific imports. If we can purchase the regions of Sonora and Chihuahua from Mexico, then we will be able to control a coast on the Atlantic and Pacific oceans, greatly increasing our industrial capability. An influential senator by the name of Turtledove has written up a proposal to be sent to Mexican diplomats - now, all we must do is authorize this purchase.
Purchase Sonora and Chihuahua

The time has come, President, to address our nation. We will let them understand the problems and victories that we have seen, and how we will face the coming years. Let freedom ring, and let other nations see the strength of our beloved democracy!
State of the Nation Speech

At last we have thrown the Confederate Americans out of Mexico! They will not be able to recover from this, and in triumph we must now return our capital to Mexico City. All Confederate claims to our lands are now invalid, thanks to Mexican supremacy!
Return to Mexico City
The Brazilians have long been our friends, and we should accept them as brothers in our nation.
Embrace Brazilian Culture
The Dixies of the CSA have long been our friends, and we should accept them as brothers in our nation.
Embrace Dixie Culture

In the 1820s, the Brazilian government signed legislature to formally end the slave trade in their country, but this law is not put into force. As the primary force in the world against the evils of slavery, it falls upon us to ensure that Brazil follows international conventions and puts an end to the slave trade.
Aberdeen Act

There exists in Brazil a sharp tension between Brazilian-born blacks and mulattos, and the African slaves taken from overseas. By favouring the mulattos and granting some of them manumission in direct opposition to the Africans, we can appease Brazilian-born slaves while sparking tensions between them and the African slaves, reduicng the chances that they will rebel against us.
Favour the Mulattos

Proper Texan lands pass across the banks of the Rio Grande into what is considered Mexican territory. We, as a now independent nation, can claim the whole of the Rio Grande region for our own, and make it Texan as it should be.
Claim the Rio Grande

Long has the United States of America laid claim to Texan lands, and many within Texas believe that it is in our best interests to submit their their notions of a vast republican empire spanning the North American continent. However, we will not let another flag fly on Texan soil, and just as our forefathers fought to keep this country free, so will we do our part. We have enough political clout now to convince the great powers of the world that the USA has no right to claim Texan soil - though the Americans will certainly not appreciate this move.
Declare Independence

With America divided between the Northern Union and the Southern Confederates, we should cast our lot in this great Civil War. Since we have long had ties to the Southern states, perhaps we should ally with them, though considering that this will quickly draw our country to war, the Texan people may not look on this decision too fondly.
Support the Confederate States

In accord with the plans of the influential Knights of the Golden Circle, we should draw Confederate interests southward, away from the foolish ideals of Manifest Destiny. The colonies of the New World where Europeans first set foot will be ours!
Claim the Golden Circle
Slavery remained in the past. All Confederate citizens, without distinction of race, must have the same rights and privileges under the law.
Integrate the African diaspora
The Rebels have won a devastating victory and we have no choice but unconditional surrender.  The Confederate States of America have won the right to forge their own destiny as a sovereign nation.
Recognize the Confederacy
Slavery has spread from Texas to Arizona and New Mexico...
The Peculiar Institution spreads West!
Form General Chief Stand Watie's First Cherokee Mounted Rifles

Chief Stand Watie of the Cherokee Nation forms the First Cherokee Mounted Rifles to fight on the side of the Confederacy in exchange for representation and citizenship for his people in the Confederate government.  His army was the last to surrender to the Union.
Move the Capital to Richmond

Where Virginia goes the South will follow.  Virginia has decided to cast her lot with the Confederacy.  We can move our capital to Richmond if so desired in order to be closer to the vital eastern front and our most densely populated states.
In order to maintain naval supremacy, we could ask the Dominion governments to contribute to the cost of constructing ships.
Dreadnoughts from the Empire
Now that we've regained control of the Haitian colony, we should show our new subjects how we respond to the slaughter of whites.
Vengeance
The Entente Cordiale

The Entente Cordiale was a series of agreements signed between the United Kingdom and France. The beginning of the 20th century saw both nations diplomatically isolated from other European powers, France by the skillful German Chancellor Otto von Bismarck, and the United Kingdom by their own choice of "Splendid Isolationism". With the balance of power shifting it would be wise to reconcile the rift that has existed between the British and French peoples for generations.
Remove the Turks
We must remove the Turks to make our nation strong and glorious, these disgusting Turkish people only inhibit our ability to govern effectively.
The Turkish are removed, our nation is now in a position to become strong once again.
The Turks have been removed.
Remove the Turks!
Remove Undesireables

Our country has been plagued for far too long by people not of our culture. These people are bringing down our economy, causing all our problems, and are the source of all our woes. We should institute a program to remove these people from our glorious country.
Remove Undesireables

Our country has been plagued for far too long by people not of our culture. These people are bringing down our economy, causing all our problems, and are the source of all our woes. We should institute a program to remove these people from our glorious country.
Remove Undesireables
Remove Undesireables
Remove the Undesireables
Remove Undesireables
Remove Undesireables
Remove the Undesireables
Integration Policy

Our policy to remove untoward elements in our country has proved successful, but new immigrants or acquisitions to the nation have not forgotten. Our core population, however, is experiencing a new state of euphoria.
Integration Policy
Support for the current war is weak, with a little effort we could start a propaganda campaign to convince them otherwise.
Encourage War
Encourage War
Support for the current war is weak, with a little effort we could start a propaganda campaign to convince them otherwise.
Revoke the Integration Policy
Active persecution of minorities within our country has brought us to the brink of unstability and drawn the ire of the world. We should revoke these policies.
Revoke the Integration Policy
Revoke the Integration Policy
Revoke the Integration Policy
Ask for Liberation
With our country occupied by a foreign power at war with our overlords, we might be able to bargain for our freedom and protection in return for our defection.

The kings of Hungary very rarely held absolute power, but was rather considered to be first among equals among the aristocracy. From very early on, although primogeniture was in effect, kings had to also be elected by the Estates before coronation. During later ages, certain aristocrats even gained the right of insurgency, should the king act tyrannically. Now, at the dawn of a New Age, the evolution of state, government and political parties made reforms necessary. It is time for our Monarch, in accordance with the Estates, to give a Constitution to His people, so we might step up to the challanges of this New Era.
Primus Inter Pares

' We demand the freedom of the press, and the abolition of censorship!' The first of twelve demands drafted by Mór Jókai and Sándor Petöfi, two young poets, during the Revolution of Pest 15th March 1848. To conclude the Springtime of Nations, we should enact more liberal press and voting rights to appease the (hopefully) rising Middle Class.
Kívánjuk a sajtó szabadságát, a cenzúra eltörlését!

The Balkans, and Bosnia, in particular, have always been a direction of Hungarian expansionism. The kings of Hungary even adopted the title King of Rama to declare their direct or indirect control over the region, but with the Ottoman onslaught, these lands were lost. Now, we have the power to revive the title and reclaim the land.
King of Rama

Ever since King László I conquered and formed a personal union with Croatia, the Dalmatian Coast has been in the Hungarian sphere of influence, constantly contested by either the Byzantines or the Venetians. Unfortunately, this land, along with many others, also fell to the Ottomans, so we should take steps to reclaim it.
The Dalmatian Coast

Halych and other Principalities of the Kievan Rus were another popular direction of expansionism of Hungary during the Medieval times. Countless campaigns were led to exert control over the region. King András II was even crowned King of Halych. Now, we have enough power and influence in the World, to revive our claims on the region. However, that was a long time ago, and did not last even then, so other Powers might not view us favorably, should we press these claims.
The Halych Claims

By conquering Galicia large number of Poles came to be under our rule. Poland and Hungary have maintained friendly relationship throughout the late Middle and the early Modern Ages. Being locked in a never ending struggle with the Ottomans and the Habsburgs, wewere in no position to prevent Russia, Prussia, and Austria to divide Poland among eachother. Because they still do not have a nation of their own, and to acknowledge our people's special relationship, we should give Polish citizens residency, so they might have a place to call home.
The Polish Enclave

Originally signed in 1868, based on the Austro-Hungarian Compromise a year before, the Croatian Compromise acknowledged the long standing autonomy of Croatia within Hungary. It allowed the formation of a Croatian Parliament and gave seats to Croatian MPs in Budapest. With this Compromise, we recognise Croatians as full right citizens of our state.
The Croatian Compromise

From the 16-17th centuries, when Hungary was ravaged from the wars with the Ottoman Empire, more and more Romanian immigrants arrived to Transylvania, in so huge numbers, that in some regions they are now in majority. The idea to have a nation of their own, spreads rapidly among them, which causes ethnic tensions to rise. We have two option. We either resume the policy of assimilation, which might lead to an explosion of ethnic tensions, or we might Compromise with them, just like we did in the Croatian Compromise. This way we recognise their citizenship and give them some of the power they seek. Having more such compromises considerably enriches our own culture, and our tolerance of minorities raises our reputation in the World. The Powers however might consider this kind of bowing to nationalist pressure a weakness.
The Romanian Compromise

Dominions of the Holy Crown is a term traditionally used for the states surrounding Hungary that are either vassals of Hungary or otherwise in the Hungarian sphere of influence. Such states were notably the military buffer states in the Balkans called "bánságok" (plural) or the vassal principality of Wallachia in the 14th century. With enough prestige and power, at the heigth of imperialism, a more direct control may be exercised over the sphere of influence.
A Szent Korona országai

Nándorfehérvár was the name of Belgrade when it was a Hungarian fortress in the (late) Middle Ages. Most notable was its siege in 1456, when János Hunyadi, Mihály Szilágyi and the crusaders of Giovanni da Capestrano defeated the Ottomans that thwarted their advance in the region for 50 years. The fortress eventually fell in 1522. The local population might not view the renaming of the city favorably.
Nándorfehérvár
We have reclaimed our capital from the opressors! We should rename it to Belgrade, that it once was.
Belgrade
In 1846 the first railroad line was built in Hungary between Pest and Vác. This marks a significant step in the modernisation of the Nation.
Pest-Vác Railroad

In 1839 works have begun on the first permanent bridge over the river Danube to connect Pest and Buda. The project's initiator was Baron István Széchenyi, and its main investor Baron György Sina. The chief engineer was scottish engineer Adam Clark, working based on the plans of englishman William Tierney Clark. The constrution lasted for 10 years.
Start Construction of Lánchíd

In 1849 the Lánchíd (i.e. chain-bridge) was finished. It was the first permanent bridge over the river Danube that connected Pest and Buda. The chief engineer was scottish engineer Adam Clark. Today, the square at the Buda bridgehead, is named after him. The Lánchíd was a significant infrastructural development, both helping trade and commerce and making the life of the population easier.
Great!
Lánchíd

The years 1895-96 are the 1000th anniversary of the Magyar tribes arriving to the Carpathian basin. On this occasion large celebrations were held throughout the country for the whole year. This was a period of great pride and nationalism. (Legend says, the academic comitee, tasked with the research of the origin of Magyars, were asked to date the arrival for a year later, as preparations for the celebrations were not yet ready in 1895.)
Millenial Celebrations

The river Tisza, flowing through Alföld, threatens large areas with its regular floods and also creating swamps in its floodplains. By regulating the river and draining the swamps, more land can be cultivated and so production increases.
Regulate Tisza River
Regulated Tisza River

For the millenial celebrations of 1896 a new and impressive building in neo-gothic style was built to house the Hungarian Parliament, ultimately making Budapest the econimic and administrative center of Hungary. The Parliament building is one of the most notable landmarks of (even modern day) Budapest and houses the Parliament ever since.
Build The Parliament
Expel the foreign oppressors from our country!
Purge Foreign Elite
Accepting the Slovakian minority as Hungarians would go a long way towards fixing our ethnic troubles.
Accepting the Slovaks
Croatian-Hungarian Settlement

Originally signed in 1868, the Croatian-Hungarian Settlement acknowledged the long standing autonomy of Croatia within Hungary. It allowed the formation of a Croatian Parliament and gave seats to Croatian MPs in Budapest, and Fiume was declared a Corpus separatum directly connected to the Lands of the Crown of Saint Stephen and therefore not falling within the domain of Croatian autonomy within the kingdom, but within the domain of the joint Hungarian parliament and government. With this Compromise, we recognise Croatians as full right citizens of our state.

In the Croatian-Hungarian Settlement, the territory known as Lands of the Crown of Saint Stephen was officially defined as "a state union of the Kingdom of Hungary and the Kingdoms of Dalmatia, Croatia and Slavonia". Since then, the Croats are pushing for uniting the Triune Kingdom under our flag. We should give them what they want - it would definitely help our economy and our dreams of becoming the main naval power of the Adriatic Sea.
Triune Kingdom
Make Budapest the Capital
Budapest has grown in one of the most important cities of Hungary, the heart of our economic activity. As such, there's nothing more natural than making it the heart of our country as well.
The Khmer Empire was once the greatest in Southern Asia, let us reclaim our old lands and forge an empire that will stand against the powers of the West.
Restoration of the Khmer Empire
The Slovene provinces of Trieste and Klagenfurt have been under foreign rulers for too long, let us reclaim our land!
Recliaming Slovene Lands
Bosnia was once an integral part of the Croatian Kingdom, and even today our ethnic legacy carries on throughout Bosnia, now that we have our sovereignty it is time for us to reclaim the region.
Reclaiming Bosnia
The Tibetan Empire once ruled a vast land that was taken away from us by the barbarians. The Tibetan people still live in these lands and the time has come for us the claim whats historically ours.
Claim Greater Tibet
Our Kurdish brothers are crying out for freedom, we should bring them into our nation and return them to us.
The Kurdish Diaspora
The Great Powers have denied Bosnia her destiny, that of ruling all the Bosniak peoples. Let us defy them, and forge a greater Bosnia by removing the Serbs from the premises!
Claim Greater Bosnia
The Great Powers have denied Bulgaria her destiny, that of ruling all Bulgarian peoples. Let us defy them, and forge the greater Bulgaria we deserve!
Reclamation of Bulgarian Lands
Persian Border Dispute
The lands of Khuzestan have been dominated by Persia for too long! It is time for us to assert our rights and take back our own!
Armenia has a rightful claim on the lands to the west, we must stake this claim and fight the Turks for it so we can unit with our brothers in Adana.
Reincorporation of the Armenian Plateau
Sevastopol is rightful Pontic clay, we must reclaim it from the scum who overran it centuries ago.
Claim Sevastopol
Now that we've regained our ancestor's holdings in Crimea, we should invite the Greeks of Russia to come back to their former home.
Greek Crimea
Now that Persia has westernized and become a power in her own right, we can reclaim the lands of our forefathers from the conquerers who have taken them from us.
Reclaiming the Afsharid Dynasty Lands
Now that we've gained our independence it is imperative to push the borders of Lithuania to our ethnic boundaries.
Greater Lithuania
Now that we've extended our realm to the Afsharid Dynasty holdings, we can try to incorporate the Pashtun regions in Afghanistan
Incorporating the Pashtun
The Basque have remained spread across Northern Spain for centuries, and now that we've gained our independence we should extend our state to all the Basque peoples.
Uniting the Basque Peoples

Since regaining our freedom from the Austrians our people have grown increasingly militaristic and the cries for retaking the provinces we lost to the Treaty of Campo Formio have grown to the point where they can no longer be ignored. It is time to reclaim our prominence in the Mediterranean.
Reclaiming Our Historical Holdings
For the first time in millenia the Assyrian peoples have a nation of their own, let us extend it to all our peoples for the glory of god!
Greater Assyria
Assyrian Empire
The Assyrians have regained our power, now we will show the world what true fear means once again.

Now that we've regained all our cultural land from the Turks and Austrians we should move to annex the province of Pancevo into our realm, the Romanian minority is eager to join us and the province would extend our natural borders along the Danube.
Extending to the Danube
Numerous groups of our people exist outside the Netherlands currently, it would be in our best interest to attempt to bring them back into the fold.
Extending Our Borders
Accepting Our Brethren

Since we've gained control of our Estonian brothers and many former Russian provinces with Karelian minorities, we should adjust our policies to be more inclusive towards them to help unite us against a renewed attempt by the Russians to conquer us.
Yugoslavia is yet to encompass all lands of the southern slavs, we must seek out and regain these lands for the good of the people.
Greater Yugoslavia
There are still French European lands that aren't under our control, we should push to integrate them into our own holdings.
French Irredentism
Je voudrais une baguette, ah ha ha, oh oh oh oh
Baguette
The current regime demands that Canada's borders be extended and who would we be to say no?
Greater Canada
With German villages and towns in the area now outside German control it would be in everyone's best interest for them to unify with Banat.
Greater Banat
Claim Greater Transylvania
We could find a solution for the lack of fertile lands in our country by claiming Banat and the Partium and thus obtaining valuable agricultural areas.
We can't let our brothers in East Prussia and Lithuania to stay under foreign rule!
Claim Greater Poland
We must claim the Greater Antilles to unite all the Caribbean islands under our Federation and to ensure our rule in the region by getting the most populous and important islands.
Claim Greater Antilles
We must claim Finnish Karelia and the Kola Peninsula to unite all Karelians under our flag.
Greater Karelia
We must free our Uighur brothers from Chinese rule to unite all of the Central Asian Turkic people under our flag!
Claim East Turkestan
We must reclaim the lands once owned by the ancient Korean kingdoms of Koguryo and Balhae to unite all Koreans under our flag.
Claim Greater Korea
We shall claim the lands inhabited by our Laz brothers to unite all Georgians under our flag.
Claim Greater Georgia
We shall claim Galicia and free our Galician brothers from the Spanish oppression.
Claim Galicia
South American Dreadnought Race

In $YEAR$, the Brazilian Navy found itself well behind the Argentine and Chilean navies in quality and total tonnage, few ships had been ordered since the 1880s, while our continental rivals Argentina and Chile had just concluded a fifteen-year naval arms race which filled their navies with modern warships. Rising demand for coffee and rubber brought the Brazilian government a large increase in revenue and voted to devote some of the proceeds to address this naval imbalance. We believe that building a strong navy would play an essential role in our goal of making the country an international power. However we lack the capacity to build our own large armored ships, so we have to buy them from another nation.
South American Dreadnought Race

Our government has turned into panic after recieving the news of Brazil ordering one of the most powerful dreadnought in the world. Some believe this new ship alone could easily destroy the entire Argentine and Chilean fleets. We quickly moved to nullify the remaining months of the naval-limiting restrictions in the 1902 pact with Chile. However we lack the capacity to build our own ship, so we have to buy them from another nation.
South American Dreadnought Race

Our government has turned into panic after recieving the news of Brazil ordering one of the most powerful dreadnought in the world. Some believe this new ship alone could easily destroy the entire Argentine and Chilean fleets. We quickly moved to nullify the remaining months of the naval-limiting restrictions in the 1902 pact with Argentina. However we lack the capacity to build our own ship, so we have to buy them from another nation.
The Pacific Reclamation
Our great standing and power in the world has allowed us to show the USA a little taste of its own medicine. We will claim the Pacific provinces for the glory of our nation.
The Pacific Reclamation
The Pacific Reclamation
The Pacific Reclamation
Embrace Wallonians
The Wallonians are a predominantly Catholic, French and German speaking nation. We should include them fully in our civil and political institutions and build a stronger country together.
Embrace Francophonie

The United Netherlands has ruled over French-speaking peoples in the south for generations now. A new political movement proposes to extend the rights currently enjoyed by the Dutch-speaking majority to the Francophone cultures of the low countries.
The Etna Expedition

Aside from the small presence at Fort du Bus, we've had no real presence on the New Guinea, and the islands remains virtually unknown to us. Scientist have long been pushing for a naturalist expedition to this unknown land. We can sent an expedition to explore the coastal regions, which might also give us insight into future locations for governmental posts.
Oslo
Christiania changes its name back to Oslo
Norway becomes an industrialized country
Tech School will changed to industrial.
The Sikh Empire is a secular, tolerant state. We shall embrace the Baluchi lands under our dominion, and together forge a nation even stronger than before.
Embrace the Baluchi

With our holdings in Moldovia cut off from the rest of Russia, it only makes sense that we give the locals more autonomy. Let the Moldivians raise their own armies-- so long as they do so in the service of the Russians.
Release Moldivia
The region of Ruthenia has belonged to the Austrians since the first partition of Poland, today we declare that we will rectify this mistake, bringing the Russian peoples there back into the fold.
The Fate of Ruthenia
Annex All of Mexico!
The breadth of our success in the war against Mexico puts us in a position to annex Mexico whole. This would undoutbably lead to resentment, both at home and abroad.
Total War in Mexico
We must enact an emergency draft to fight the Americans.
Reinstitute Slavery
Reinstitute Slavery
Reinstitute Slavery

Lincoln had it all wrong. This nation's woes stem from the freedom of the Negroes, and our recent political movements have proven this to be so. We must reinstitute slavery to provide a better economy for our nation and a better future for our children.
Reinstitute Slavery
Now that the powerful nations of the west have recognized our power and see us as equals, we should annex our Cambodian puppet government.
Annex Cambodia
We currently don't possess a base to protect our merchant fleet near Arabia, we could approach the Sultanate of Lahej about purchasing the town of Aden to use as a port in the region.
Port of Aden
The Aden Protectorate

With enough influence among the sheiks of southern Yemen, a treaty could be signed that would force them to acknowledge us as their sovereign. We cede them Aden, and in return they would agree to enter into no relationships with other nations without our express permission. Our continued influence over the Arabian peninsula would be secured.
Become Yemen
The Sultanates of Yemen must be united under a single flag -- ours.
Become Yemen
Northern and Southern Yemeni must be united under a single flag-- ours.
Form Yemen
We are in a position to unite the Southern and Northern Yemeni tribes under a single unified puppet state.
Annex Egypt

Since we defeated the Mamluks in 1517, the Ottoman Empire has nominally ruled Egypt. Though how much control we have been able to exercise has varied throughout the centuries, our nation's current strength, bolstered by new military technologies that put us leagues ahead of them, will now allow us to rule Egypt more directly than ever before.
Annex Tunis

In order to improve the efficiency of railroads in our nation, we have adopted a system of standard time to prevent any confusion between train stations on the length of our railroad networks. We will name the centre of these time-zones "Confederate Standard Time," and we believe that this idea will be well-liked by similarly minded countries.

Pioneered by men like Scott Joplin and Ernest Hogan, ragtime is a genre of music that began amongst African-Americans in the South. Afterwards, it became widely known and widely played on piano, and had a key role in popularizing new music recording methods and the later genre of jazz.

Blues music, like ragtime and jazz before it, was first played and composed by Afro-American musicians of the American South. While jazz enjoyed popularity amongst blacks and whites in the 1920s and 1930s, blues was mostly relegated to black listeners until after the Second World War. It was arguably formed as a musical genre in 1912 with the publishing of Hart Wand's "Dallas Blues," but has its roots in traditional slave songs of the 19th century. Most famously, blues later became the bedrock for the most popular musical sensation of them all: rock n' roll.

Though the North always was the industrial centre of America, in the Deep South there was the city of New Orleans, always full of sound and lights. The epitome of southern prosperity, New Orleans was a hub of trade and immigration, and at its peak was the third largest city in the entire United States.

The city of New Orleans always has had an association with the festival of Mardi Gras, a Christian cultural celebration taking place prior to the season of Lent brought to the area by French Catholic colonists. Normally it is meant to be just a single day of celebrations, but in New Orleans the colourful and energetic Mardi Gras can last for several days more. Mardi Gras was recognized as an official state holiday of Louisiana in 1875.

Politeness, etiquette, and the warm comforts of home: these define the ideal of Southern hospitality, and is a major characterizing point of our nation. People are expected to respect their neighbours and use polite terms even when addressing strangers. Some feel that this is an act put on to cover up Southern flaws such as slavery and widespread poverty, but its nature can be traced back to the traditional Christian moral influence on the Southern states before secession. Regardless, it's made a good mark on our country, and we're proud of it.

Founded in 1871, the National Rifle Association was originally a set of shooting clubs organized to improve the marksmanship of American soldiers. After the Civil War, it was noted that few shots fired actually hit their targets, so improved drill was in order. These shooting clubs improved skill with firearms, and contributed to the military as a whole moving away from the classic style of rank and file warfare, which put focus on volume of fire rather than accuracy. Within a few decades, firearms and marksmanship became a proud part of the country's culture.

One hundred years ago, the Thirteen Colonies organized and succeeded in their rebellion against their British colonial oppressors, forming the United States of America on the 4th of July, 1776. We have seen this country through fire and water, but by God, we will never let America fall. Now unto the end of time, the United States will be a shining name in the pages of history, a beacon of freedom and democracy in the world. Today of all days, we truly should be proud.

The government could step in and take care of everything in place of the local industrialists and clubs that may have caused the flood, or we can require that the groups pay from their own pockets to fix their mistake.

Though our war with the Confederate States is far from over, it isn't going either poorly or well. We're in the middle of a war, so we have to choose some way to deal with them, without sacrificing our draft. The question is, are these riots worth putting down, or are our other concerns far greater?

The New Prime Minister, a Freemason and a Catholic himself, has called for his own resignation in the case that amnesty is not granted to Costa and Vidal. It seems we've been dragged into a situation in which we cannot end things positively.

We are at war for our freedom! This conflict will not be an easy one, but there certainly must be other countries that can aid us in achieving the independence that we need. Shall we seek them out, or face American wrath alone?

Civil war rages in America, and the people of New York City have requested that we aid them in their conflict. If we choose to do so, it may anger people within our own country who seek independence, and certainly the Americans will be less than pleased.

The Uruguayan Civil War

On July 18, 1830, Uruguay enacted its first constitution. Uruguay's leaders fiercely protected free speech within the nation's parliament - even when legislators voiced views that directly opposed those of the president. These measures did not mean that Uruguay's early decades were easy or calm, however: in addition to threats from its much larger neighbors, the young nation suffered from internal strife. The new constitution had made José Fructuoso Rivera the country's first president. When his political rival, Manuel Oribe became president in 1834, Fructuoso revolted against him. By the mid-1830s, two fiercely opposed political parties had emerged from these internal struggles. Oribe headed a group called the Blancos, who mainly represented gauchos, shepherds, and other rural citizens. Fructuoso led their opponents, the Colorados, who were more supportive of the residents of Montevideo and their business interests. As battles between the groups increased, the rivalry grew into a civil war.
